TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit Form/ControlCollection extends System.Windows.Forms.Control/ControlCollection

summary.span: Representa una colección de controles en el formulario.

span.span: Represents a collection of controls on the form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esta clase representa la colección de controles incluidos en un formulario.This class represents the collection of controls contained within a form. Puede usar el método para agregar un control al formulario y método para quitar el control del formulario.You can use the method to add a control to the form and the method to remove the control from the form. La colección de controles representada por esta clase no se puede crear sin enlazarlo a una forma específica.The control collection represented by this class cannot be created without binding it to a specific form. Como resultado, no puede crear varias instancias de esta colección de controles y con un formulario activo para proporcionar distintos diseños de control de intercambio de ellos.As a result, you cannot create multiple instances of this control collection and interchange them with an active form to provide different control layouts. ## Examples En el ejemplo de código siguiente se agrega un y control a la colección de controles de un formulario.The following code example adds a and control to the control collection of a form. En el ejemplo se requiere que un formulario se ha creado y denominado `Form1`.The example requires that a form has been created and named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[Classic Form.ControlCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.ControlCollection Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Form.ControlCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.ControlCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Form.ControlCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.ControlCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Forms.Form owner) cil managed

param.name: owner
param.span: que contendrá los controles que se agreguen a la colección de controles.

span.span: The to contain the controls added to the control collection.

summary.span: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase .

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este constructor permite enlazar correctamente la colección de controles al formulario para permitir que los controles que se agregan al formulario.This constructor allows you to properly bind the control collection to the form to enable controls to be added to the form. > [!NOTE] > Dado que la colección de controles debe crearse con una forma específica, no puede crear varias colecciones de controles e intercambio ellos con el formulario.Because the control collection must be created with a specified form, you cannot create multiple collections of controls and interchange them with the form.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Add(class System.Windows.Forms.Control value) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Add (value As Control)

span.span: The to add to the form.
Adds a control to the form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Puede usar este método para agregar controles al formulario.You can use this method to add controls to the form. Si desea agregar un grupo de controles ya creados al formulario, use la método de la clase.If you want to add a group of already created controls to the form, use the method of the class. ## Examples En el ejemplo de código siguiente se agrega un y control a la colección de controles de un formulario.The following code example adds a and control to the control collection of a form. En el ejemplo se requiere que un formulario se ha creado y denominado `Form1`.The example requires that a form has been created and named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[Classic Form.ControlCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.ControlCollection Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Form.ControlCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.ControlCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Form.ControlCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.ControlCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: No se pueden agregar controles a un formulario MDI (interfaz de múltiples documentos) principal.

span.span: A multiple document interface (MDI) parent form cannot have controls added to it.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Remove(class System.Windows.Forms.Control value) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Remove (value As Control)

param.name: value
param.span: que se va a quitar del formulario.

span.span: A to remove from the form.
Removes a control from the form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Puede usar este método para quitar controles que ya no necesite en el formulario.You can use this method to remove controls that you no longer need in your form. Si desea mostrar un control después de quitarlo, debe agregar el control al formulario, utilizando el método.If you want to display a control after it is removed, you will need to add the control back to the form using the method. Para tener un control permanecen en el formulario, pero no aparece, use la propiedad del control.To have a control remain on the form but not displayed, use the property of the control.
